segments.text: This kitchen drawing catches my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is busy at the sink, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She wears a simple dress, looking content in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the running water has filled the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, flooding the area around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle after puddle forms, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the children are causing their own trouble nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on a shaky stool by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snatching cookies from the jar up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand steadies a plate, the other grabs the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, eyes wide with expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're in cahoots, defying the rules quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a lovely, orderly garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How ironic that calm exists just beyond the glass.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This neglect could lead to real harm, and it upsets me.
segments.speaker: PAR
